## Bladeburner.inBladeburner() method

Returns whether player is a member of bladeburner division. Does not require API access.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inBladeburner(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

whether player is a member of bladeburner division.
